result.title: Study of the green ammonia distribution for shipping
result.description: A report that outlines a strategy for green ammonia production for shipping. This will include a review of supply and infrastructure for green ammonia for shipping, a review of the requirements of the shipping use case, and recommendations on how to proceed towards meeting shipping requirements.
